zh.title: 以太坊/美元技术分析：[震荡整理，短期谨慎]
zh.content:
当前以太坊（ETH/USD）的市场表现显示出轻微的震荡整理趋势。最新价格为2968.11美元，24小时变化幅度较小，仅为-0.10%。在高点2971.33美元和低点2968.02美元之间波动，表明市场多空双方的力量相对均衡，短期内缺乏明确的方向。

从技术指标来看，MACD显示出正值6.33502，暗示近期的上涨动能仍然存在，但由于缺乏其他指标如RSI的配合，市场情绪尚不明朗。20日简单移动平均线（SMA）在2966.71美元附近，表明该水平可能成为短期支撑位，投资者需密切关注价格走势。

支撑位方面，2968美元一线是关键支撑，若跌破该价位，可能会引发进一步回调。上方阻力位在2971.33美元，若突破该水平，可能会刺激短期买盘。综合来看，建议投资者在当前震荡区间内采取谨慎态度，可考虑短线交易，待价格突破关键支撑或阻力位后再做进一步决策。

en.title: Ethereum vs US Dollar Technical Analysis
en.content:
The current price of Ethereum (ETH) against the US Dollar (USD) stands at 2968.11, showing a slight decline of 0.10% over the past 24 hours. This minor downturn suggests a period of consolidation following previous price movements. The price has oscillated between a high of 2971.33 and a low of 2968.02, indicating tight trading ranges. Traders should remain vigilant to potential breakouts or breakdowns from this narrow band, as they could signal the next significant move.

In terms of technical indicators, the MACD currently registers at 6.33502, suggesting a bullish momentum, albeit without a corresponding signal line for confirmation. The absence of a signal line weakens the reliability of the MACD as a buy or sell signal at this moment. Additionally, the simple moving average (SMA) for the last 20 periods is positioned at 2966.71450, which serves as a dynamic support level. If the price holds above this SMA, it may indicate a continuation of the upward trend; however, a drop below could trigger bearish sentiment.

Key support levels can be identified around the recent low of 2968.02, while resistance can be observed at 2971.33. A break above this resistance could pave the way for a move towards higher price targets, whereas a failure to maintain above support might lead to a test of lower levels. Traders should watch these levels closely, as they will likely dictate the short-term direction of ETH/USD.

In conclusion, the current market for ETH/USD presents a cautious outlook. Traders might consider adopting a wait-and-see approach, observing price action around the identified support and resistance levels. Those looking for entry points could seek to buy on dips near the SMA, while those with long positions might consider setting stop-loss orders just below 2968.02 to protect against potential breakdowns.
